page.title: 08ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: There is an annual church fete at Cotleigh,the proceeds of which go to church and village hall funds.A recent innovation is a car treasure hunt taking place on a summer evening. During winter there are discos in the village hall which has a licenced bar.Next to the hall is a recreation ground with swings and a slide.A point to_point meeting took place this year for the first time.In Stockland parish people attend Stockland Fair and other local entertainments such as occasional concerts,plays,musical evenings and the Harvest Supper.
